name: endoergic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A nuclear reaction that is endoergic absorbs energy: endoergic reaction Molecules that are the result of endoergic reactions may break down. All photonuclear reactions are endoergic. Compare
endothermic
More examplesFewer examplesEnergy has been absorbed and the reaction is therefore endoergic.This is an endoergic reaction in which a neutron is emitted.This kinetic energy must be exceeded in any reaction between two charged particles, including endoergic ones.For endoergic reactions to take place, a certain amount of kinetic energy is required.
